00032 struct F  //Faces
00033 {
00034         V *v1, *v2, *v3, *v4;
00035         Vector2f *vt1, *vt2, *vt3, *vt4;

00037 };
00038 //--------------------------------------------------
00042 struct G  //Sub-Objects
00043 {
00044         string label;
00045         F *faces;
00046         int anzf;
00047         string texname;
00048         string texname2;
00049         string texname3;
00050         int textur;
00051         int textur2;
00052         int textur3;
00053 
00054         Shader *shader;
00055         Material *material;
00056 
00057         G()
00058         {
00059                 shader = NULL;
00060                 material = NULL;
00061 
00062                 textur = -1;
00063                 textur2 = -1;
00064                 textur3 = -1;
00065         }
00066 
00067         ~G()
00068         {
00069                 //if (shader != NULL) delete shader;      //its done by the Shaderloader
00070                 if (material != NULL) delete material;
00071         }
00072 
00073 };
